description:
Demolition of all existing buildings and the redevelopment of the site to provide a double storey basement with four buildings of 2, 9, 11, 32 and 42 storeys comprising 578 residential flats (Use class C3)(mix of 1bed, 2 bed and 3 bed flats) and 3079.2sqm (GIA) of flexible use class A1 and/or A2 and/or A3 and/or A4 and/or B1 and/or D1 and/or D2 floorspace, landscaped east-to-west public route between Victoria Road and Portal Way, together with associated amenity and play space, roof gardens, cycle parking, car parking, servicing, public realm improvements, landscaping and infrastructure works. (Full Planning Application accompanied by an Environmental Impact
Assessment)- (Out of Borough application from London Borough of Hammersmith & Fulham ref. no. 2016/01488/OBS )
